name: Escaping Lunacy
description:
Collect shadows from enemies and run through a weirdly twisted 
world to reach the moon. Break out of a cycle of madness.

You play a small ghost and his shadow. The shadow protects the player and must make sure that the player reaches his destination safely.

The further you progress in the game, the closer you get to the moon and the lower the gravity is that keeps you on the ground. The world gets noticeably stranger as the player progresses. 

If you make a mistake, you have to repeat the current stage again.

This game was developed by Samuel Knüsel & Dana Senn
Music was composed by Reina Burkhalter
